text: C&D; may refer to: * Cease and desist, an order to stop an activity * C&D; (Creativity & Development), French-Japanese animation firm started by Jean Chalopin, DIC Entertainment founder * C&D; Aerospace, part of the French corporation Zodiac Aerospace * C&D; Canal, a ship canal connecting the Delaware River with Chesapeake Bay in the United States * C&D; International Plaza, the tallest building in Xiamen, China as of 2013 * C&D; waste, waste from construction and demolition
title: C&D
